item.title: Building the Foundation: MVP in 72 Hours
item.description: From vault design to working code in 72 hours. The 3-hour refactoring marathon, the first successful parse, and 6 content ideas from 1 conversation.

item.title: Day Zero: The ConvoCanvas Vision
item.description: The context window overflow error that sparked a 25-day process from idea to fully automated infrastructure. Looking back, this is how it all began.
